error.signature: botocore.exceptions.NoRegionError: You must specify a region
error.regex: NoRegionError|You must specify a region|could not be found.*region

verdict.summary: AWS region not configured. Set via env var, config file, or SDK parameter.

dead_ends.why_fails: Breaks for resources in other regions and couples code to region

dead_ends.action: Set region in every boto3 call
dead_ends.why_fails: Verbose and easy to miss â€” set it once globally

workarounds.action: Set AWS_DEFAULT_REGION env var: export AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-1
Configure in ~/.aws/config: aws configure set region us-east-1
Set in boto3 client: boto3.client('s3', region_name='us-east-1')

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'botocore.exceptions.NoRegionError' indicates a missing AWS region configuration, while 'service unable to place tasks' indicates ECS unable to place tasks on instances.

'botocore.exceptions.NoRegionError' indicates a missing AWS region configuration, while 'An error occurred (ParameterNotFound) when calling the GetParameter operation' indicates a missing SSM Parameter Store parameter.
